backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining user, artist, artwork, submission, and inquiry types with maps for storage plus profile management and access‑controlled operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that defines legacy data structures and returns old state unchanged during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend files and components for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the root div and loading the React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, layout, and profile setup modal for the app.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiriesT: Admin table view displaying purchase inquiries with artwork preview, buyer info, message, and date.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReplaceDat: Admin control with confirmation dialog to wipe all data and replace it using demo dataset.
frontend/src/components/admin/Submission: Displays artwork submissions in a table with status, image preview, and approve/reject actions using admin hooks.
frontend/src/components/artists/CreateAr: Form for creating an artist profile with validation, error handling, and success messaging.
frontend/src/components/artworks/EditArt: Form to edit artwork details and optionally replace the image, with validation and authorization-aware error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guards admin routes by checking authentication and admin permissions, showing appropriate alerts or content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state and automatic error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to complete their profile, including optional avatar upload and form validation.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ArtworkC: Displays an artwork card with image, title, artist, and price, supporting lightbox preview and navigation to detail view.
frontend/src/components/images/ArtworkIm: Displays artwork images with URL validation, error handling, loading state, and optional click behavior.
frontend/src/components/images/ArtworkLi: Full-screen dialog lightbox for viewing an artwork image with close controls.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Purcha: Dialog form for submitting purchase inquiries with validation, loading states, and success messaging.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with branding and external link attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation links, login button, mobile menu, and admin/profile shortcuts.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper that includes header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/submissions/Subm: Confirmation card shown after artwork submission with submission ID and navigation options.
Artwork submission form with image upload, drafts, validation, profile checks, and submission handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages authenticated or anonymous backend actor creation and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDashboard.ts: Hooks for fetching and managing artwork submissions and purchase inquiries, including approve and reject mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtists.ts: Provides hooks to fetch artist profiles, get an artist by ID, fetch the caller’s profile, and create new artist profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworks.ts: Hooks to retrieve all artworks or a specific artwork by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Handles user profile retrieval, saving, and checking if the caller is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteArtwork.ts: Mutation hook for deleting artwork and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditArtwork.ts: Mutation hook for editing artwork details and refreshing dependent caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMySubmissions.ts: Fetches artwork submissions created by the current authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseInquiry.ts: Mutation hook to submit a purchase inquiry and refresh inquiry data.
frontend/src/hooks/useReplaceDataset.ts: Mutation hook that triggers a dataset reset and invalidates all major data queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitArtwork.ts: Mutation hook to submit new artwork and refresh artwork and submission lists.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, and layout utilities for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard UI with tabs for submissions, inquiries, and dataset replacement.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistProfilePage.tsx: Displays an artist’s profile and filters artworks belonging to that artist.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistsPage.tsx: Displays a list of artists with cards, loading states, and navigation to artist profiles.
frontend/src/pages/ArtworkDetailsPage.ts: Shows detailed artwork info, owner controls, purchase inquiry, image lightbox, and delete handling.
frontend/src/pages/EditArtworkPage.tsx: Provides an edit form for artwork with authentication, ownership checks, and navigation helpers.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery of artworks with filtering, sorting, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero, feature sections, and navigation to gallery or submission page.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and edit their profile, including avatar upload and validation.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitArtworkPage.tsx: Provides an artwork submission form and shows confirmation after successful submission.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts an image file to a data URL with type and size validation.
frontend/src/utils/gbpMoney.ts: Utility functions for formatting, parsing, and converting GBP values between display and minor units.
frontend/src/utils/imageFailureReason.ts: Provides functions to validate image URLs and generate user-friendly error messages for image load failures.
frontend/src/utils/submitArtworkDraft.ts: Manages saving, loading, and clearing artwork submission drafts in sessionStorage with basic structure validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including schema version, architectural notes, issues, and lists of existing and requested features.
